The package provides functions to analyse and visualize the results of an [STM](https://github.com/bstewart/stm) topic model, including a Shiny application for topic model exploration.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sdaume/topicsplorrr")
```


## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(topicsplorrr)
## basic example code
```
